title: Galactic Zoo on Apple Podcasts
cleaned_text: An alternative look at the world through the eyes of comedian Tony Marrese and Guests. Metaphysics, conspiracies, alternative health, hidden history, aliens, paranormal and spirituality. show are 1 hour long with interviews, news, laughter and great information. Galactic Zoo Tony marrese - - Comedy An alternative look at the world through the eyes of comedian Tony Marrese and Guests. Metaphysics, conspiracies, alternative health, hidden history, aliens, paranormal and spirituality. show are 1 hour long with interviews, news, laughter and great information. - [Interview with Harry Rhodes Number 2, discussing treatments for detoxing from graphene oxide and heavy metals, geoengineering, blood condition and staying well in our toxic world.](https://podcasts.apple.com/sk/podcast/interview-with-harry-rhodes-number-2-discussing/id1586692433?i=1000587632044) Interview with Harry Rhodes Number 2, discussing treatments for detoxing from graphene oxide and heavy metals, geoengineering, blood condition and staying well in our toxic world. This is my 2nd interview with Harry Rhodes from onlyresultscount.com we discuss a breakthrough discovery utilising a very old allopathic medicine and its potential use as a detox from modern medical treatments that may be harming the health of some users. Other topics covered are five geee, magnetic radiation and the fight for the human soul. - [Interview with Elana Freeland](https://podcasts.apple.com/sk/podcast/interview-with-elana-freeland/id1586692433?i=1000585765845) Interview with Elana Freeland Elana Freeland is a world renowned writer, lecturer, Rudolf Steiner expert, researcher and truth seeker. Her books inc 'Chemtrails Haarp and the full spectrum dominance of the earth' 'Geoengineered Transhumanism' Under an Ionized Sky' and more. Her website contains all the info on her books, and the work she does. https://www.elanafreeland.com/ We talked on various subjects inc, MK ULTRA, Targeted individuals, spirit realm, CIA cults, The Etheric Body, Spirituality and spirit attack, Mind control and more! The next interview will be solely about the ongoing Geoengineering programme. - [Discussion with Jim Grant from 'Beyond The News' on how to convince people that conspiracies are often true!](https://podcasts.apple.com/sk/podcast/discussion-with-jim-grant-from-beyond-the-news-on-how/id1586692433?i=1000580524446) Discussion with Jim Grant from 'Beyond The News' on how to convince people that conspiracies are often true! Epic discussion with Jim Grant on many conspiracy subjects including, JFK, The Plandemic, 9-11 and more, plus current world events. Jim only uses MSM released stories to prove his points and show how we are being lied to daily on an huge scale. He also offers techniques on how to turn people to the painful truth without blowing their minds. - [Introduction to Rudolph Steiner part 2, with Mike Howell. Steiner based Education](https://podcasts.apple.com/sk/podcast/introduction-to-rudolph-steiner-part-2-with-mike/id1586692433?i=1000578330902) Introduction to Rudolph Steiner part 2, with Mike Howell. Steiner based Education Episode 2 of my interview with Steiner expert Mike Howell. In this episode we discuss Steiner school education and philosophy. - [An introduction to Rudolph Steiner with Mike Howell part 1](https://podcasts.apple.com/sk/podcast/an-introduction-to-rudolph-steiner-with-mike-howell-part-1/id1586692433?i=1000575305840) An introduction to Rudolph Steiner with Mike Howell part 1 Rudolph Steiner is probably one of the greatest minds humanity has ever been blessed with, his body of works and influence on the world at large is to a great extent largely unknown outside of Germany, Austria and the Netherlands. Anthroposophy, Biodynamic farming and The Waldorf schools system are some of his great achievements. In this discussion Steiner expert Mike Howell gives us an outline introduction to the man and his ideas. - [Interview with comedian Ben Adams, UFO's, Atheism to Spirituality, talking to ghosts](https://podcasts.apple.com/sk/podcast/interview-with-comedian-ben-adams-ufos-atheism-to/id1586692433?i=1000570381478) Interview with comedian Ben Adams, UFO's, Atheism to Spirituality, talking to ghosts A frank and funny chat with my old stand up comedy pal Mr Ben Adams of Broken Toaster fame!. We discuss Bens journey out of the matrix, his experiences talking to ghosts, UFO's and his journey from atheism to spirituality. One of the few awakened comedians in the UK today.
